Name: Rude Ginger Cosmopolitan
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add the other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: To quote Halo's cocktail list, the bar where we discovered this drink, "Looks like a cosmo, goes like a Mexican!"
History: Created in 2003 by Jeremy Adderley at Halo, Edinburgh, Scotland. Also see the origin and story behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail .
